'''Corinne Davis''' is the mother of [[Fillmore Davis]].

==History==
===Wedding Planning===
After Dink and Maya decided to get married because Maya was pregnant, Corinne met with Sam to start planning the wedding. She suggested they move into her guesthouse and continue going to school. When Naomi refused to participate in any discussions, she and Sam talked about what they wanted to do for their kids. ''("[[Shotgun]]")''

===Wedding===
As the wedding approached, Corinne bonded with Maya, taking her out for a spa day and trial hair and makeup. Once the wedding was all planned, Maya and Dink were married. ''("[['Til Death Do Us Part]]")''

==Relationships==
===Familial===
She is the mother of Fillmore "Dink" Davis and the mother in-law of Maya Bennett.
